name: Headpat Simulator (kunoleo)
description:
A simple game, you just head pat the girl.

This is much like all them clicker games, but with head pats.

click and hold the cursor on her head and rob it.

the game will keep track of all the head pats you've given her, in case you ever come back.

Might update with more stuff in the future, if you ask nicely.
